analysis.description:
SOLID.startDate (/unique_chucks/16/0xe806751624417e7d8090cf40c7c03533a7939173.sol#132) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xe806751624417e7d8090cf40c7c03533a7939173.sol#240-253)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0xe806751624417e7d8090cf40c7c03533a7939173.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/16/0xe806751624417e7d8090cf40c7c03533a7939173.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xe806751624417e7d8090cf40c7c03533a7939173.sol#109-110) is not in mixedCase
